Elements.Body: Finally in the mood to talk?

No but actually, you didn’t say anything unreasonable. I think I got pissed off because I knew you were right. Megan’s a lost cause compared to these hundred missing since the blackout. Maybe there’s a chance we find out about them.

No but actually, you didn’t say anything unreasonable. I think I got pissed off because I knew you were right. Megan’s a lost cause compared to these hundred missing since the blackout. Maybe there’s a chance we find out about them.
I know it’s hard to admit it, but Megan’s disappearance isn’t the important thing to worry about right now.
Megan’s disappearance might even be related to the others.
I just wish I could actually do something - anything - to look for these people and Megan. I mean, the cops were annoying as hell with their dumbass questions but at least they listened.
I just wish I could actually do something - anything - to look for these people and Megan. I mean, the cops were annoying as hell with their dumbass questions but at least they listened.
They listened, but they weren’t helping.
You care more than others do, and that says a lot.
